trans-unit.source: Additionally, redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification, are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: 此外,允许在满足以下条件的情况下,以源码和二进制形式重新分发和使用,无论是否修改:

trans-unit.source: Customized widgets for Oasys developed at the APS-ANL
trans-unit.target: 在APS-ANL为Oasys开发的定制小部件
